name: December. Somewhere outside.
description:
December. Somewhere outside.

Baby, it's cold outside. Strap on some skates and make some friends.

Instructions:

  • Move with WASD or Arrow Keys. 
  • Advance dialogue with Space Bar
  • Walk into things to interact with them. 

This is my first Bitsy game, made as part of Biome Collective and InGame's Bitsy workshop.
